info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: This component will read an input CSV file and anonymize specified column(s). This component differs from the Anonymize Standalone component in that it will keep a version of the input file on the server. As such, the output, with anonymized data, is then available for use in downstream components.
info.inputs: CSV - Please ensure that you select the CSV type in the import to allow the headers to populate in the options pane.
info.options: Salt - This is a string that ensures that you are using a unique anonymization scheme. Please remember this salt to use across multiple files and do not share this string. Salt on Wikipedia
